About the policy: Provides benefit on Lump Sum basis for the incidental expenses incurred by the insured during hospitalization due to sickness/illness/injury.
For Whom: For Individual and Family (Family means - Self, Spouse and economically dependent children)
Entry Age: For Adults: 18 years – 65 years, For Dependent Children: 91 days - 25 years
Hospital Cash Amount (per day): Basic Plan Options: 1000/-, 2000/-, 3000/-; Enhanced Plan Options: 3000/-, 4000/-, 5000/-
Number of Hospital Cash Days Options (pe: Basic Plan Options: 30 / 60 / 90 / 120 / 180 days; Enhanced Plan Options: 90 / 120 / 180 days

Applicable for Basic and Enhanced Plan.Sickness Hospital Cash: Hospital Cash Amount chosen by the insured (per day) payable up to maximum number of Days chosen by the insured. (Deductible: 1 day deductible is applicable only for basic plan)
Applicable for Basic and Enhanced Plan.Accident Hospital Cash: 150% of the Hospital Cash Amount chosen by the insured (per day) payable up to maximum number of Days chosen by the insured.
Applicable for Basic and Enhanced Plan.ICU Hospital Cash: 200% of the hospital cash amount chosen by the insured (per day); Individual Policy: maximum of 30 days; Floater Policy: maximum of 90 days

Enhanced Plan.Convalescence Hospital Cash: 1 Day additional hospital cash amount is payable if the hospitalization is beyond 5 consecutive Days.
Enhanced Plan.Child Birth Hospital Cash: Hospital Cash Amount chosen by the insured (per day) payable up to maximum number of Days chosen by the insured. (Available for female insured persons only)
Enhanced Plan.Waiting Period: 2 years from the first commencement of this policy.
Enhanced Plan.Worldwide Hospital Cash: 200% of the Hospital Cash Amount chosen by the insured (per day) payable up to maximum number of Days chosen by the insured.

Day Care Procedures: Day Care Procedures (Applicable for both Basic and Enhanced Plans): Hospital Cash Amount chosen by the insured (per day) payable for five times in a policy year. Available for the following Day Care Procedures: (1) Fractures (other than hairline fractures) (2) Cataract (3) Dilatation and Curettage (4) Hemodialysis (5) Parenteral Chemotherapy (6) Radio Therapy (7) Coronary Angiography (8) Lithotripsy (9) Manipulation for Dislocation under General Anesthesia (10) Cystoscopy under General Anesthesia.

Waiting Period.Basic Plan: 30 days waiting period (other than accidents), 24 months for specified illness/disease/treatment, 36 months for pre existing diseases
Waiting Period.Enhanced Plan: 30 days waiting period (other than accidents), 24 months for specified illness/disease/treatment, 24 months for pre existing diseases
